SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
Represents administrator within the system, extending the User class.
AdministratorStrategy
This strategy customizes interface to show controls relevant to administrative functions.
AggregateFunds
Provides static methods to manage financial aspects of critic accounts, specifically focusing on calculating and updating balances based on review activities.
AggregateScore
Provides utility class for recalculating and updating scores of the game based on new or updated reviews from users.
AlertUtil
Utility class for creating and displaying customized alerts in the application.
AppController
Main application controller for initializing and managing primary stage.
Critic
Represents critic within the system, extending the User class with additional attributes and functionalities specific to critics.
CriticStrategy
This strategy customizes interface to show controls and information relevant to critic , such as balance display and the option to transfer funds, while hiding administrative controls.
CurrentGame
Singleton class for managing the currently selected game across the application.
CurrentReview
Singleton class for managing the currently selected review across the application.
CurrentUser
Singleton class for managing current user session across the application.
CurrentYear
Singleton class for managing currently selected year in the application.
DataBaseUtil
Utility class for managing all database interactions within the application.
DateUtil
Provides utility methods for handling date and time transformations across the application.
DetailedReview
Represents detailed review that includes not only basic review elements but also specific positives and negatives about the game.
FieldInterface
Interface that extends StyleInterface by inheriting its constants, and defines methods to set the styles of field elements depending on the state of data validation.
FileLogger
Decorator that provides logging messages to a file.
FontLoadingException
Exception class to handle errors when loading fonts.
FontUtil
Utility class for loading custom fonts used throughout the application.
Game
Represents game within the application, encapsulating all details relevant to single game entry, acts as a data model for handling game information.
GamesController
Controller handles dynamic creation of game cards based on data got from database and manages layout configurations for displaying these cards within a grid.
GameViewController
Controller for game view screen, displaying detailed information about selected game.
HomeController
Controller for managing display of games on the home screen of the application.
ImageUtil
Utility class for asynchronously loading images in the application.
Logger
Defines the basics for logging messages with different severity levels.
LoggerDecorator
Decorator that allows for adding new functionalities to loggers without modifying their structure.
LoggerLevel
Defines the levels of logging used to differentiate the severity of an event.
LoginController
Controller for managing user login process.
PasswordValidationRule
Concrete implementation of ValidationRule for validating passwords.
ProcessGameController
Controller for managing game information in application.
ProfileController
Controller class responsible for managing user profile.
ProfileStrategyInterface
Defines the strategy interface for configuring gui components based on the users role.
RegisterController
Controller class responsible for handling registration of new users.
Review
Represents review made by user on a game, acts as data model for handling review information.
ReviewController
Controller that manages user interaction for reviewing games.
ReviewValidationRule
Concrete implementation of ValidationRule for validating review texts.
ReviewViewController
Controller class responsible for displaying detailed view of review.
SceneController
Singleton class that manages scene transitions within the application.
StyleInterface
Interface that defines set of constant string values and methods.
TimeLogger
Decorator for loggers that adds a timestamp before each log entry.
ToolBarInterface
Interface defining methods for standard toolbar buttons within the application's gui.
User
Represents a user within the system, encapsulating key user information and functionalities.
UserDataLogger
Decorator for loggers that appends user credentials to the log message.
UsernameValidationRule
Concrete implementation of ValidationRule for validating usernames.
UserStrategy
This strategy hides elements that are not relevant to regular user, ensuring that the user interface remains clean and relevant to the functionalities available to standard user.
ValidationRule
Represents generic rule for validating string inputs across the application.
ValidationRuleFactory
Factory class that produces instances of ValidationRule based on given identifiers.
YearDetailsController
Controller class responsible for displaying the "Game of the Year" awards for a selected year.
YearsController
Controller class that handles display of different years in which games have received awards.
